snippet: Rather than have the so-called fiscal cliff bill flown to Hawaii, where he is vacationing with his family, the president directed that the bill be signed with the White House autopen.
abstract: Rather than have the so-called fiscal cliff bill flown to Hawaii, where he is vacationing with his family, the president directed that the bill be signed with the White House autopen.

headline.main: Obama Signs Tax Deal Remotely Using Autopen
